Interface VMConsumerI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentImplementedI, RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VMConnector, VMOutboundPort

    public interface VMConsumerI
extends RequiredI
    L'interface VMConsumerI, requiert des fonctions pour le composant VirtualMachine
